publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4225 David Whitton: 2009 Scottish School Magazine Competition, Boclair Academy, East Dunbartonshire—That the Parliament congratulates Boclair Academy in East Dunbartonshire on being nominated in a record seven out of 10 categories for an award in the 2009 Scottish School Magazine Competition; notes that the school magazine, Bac Talk, has been nominated in the categories of best magazine cover, best overall design and layout, best original artwork or photograph, best commercial strategy, most inspirational teacher, outstanding individual and Scottish school magazine of the year 2009, and wishes Boclair Academy and the other schools taking part the best of luck.

S3M-4225 2009 Scottish School Magazine Competition, Boclair Academy, East Dunbartonshire (lodged on 26 May 2009) Margaret Mitchell*, Des McNulty*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Mary Mulligan*, Karen Whitefield*, Bill Kidd*, Gil Paterson*, Jamie McGrigor*, John Park*, Stuart McMillan*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S3M-4225 2009 Scottish School Magazine Competition, Boclair Academy, East Dunbartonshire (lodged on 26 May 2009) Jackie Baillie*, Ken Macintosh*, Hugh Henry*, Sandra White*

S3M-4225 David Whitton: 2009 Scottish School Magazine Competition, Boclair Academy, East Dunbartonshire—That the Parliament congratulates Boclair Academy in East Dunbartonshire on being nominated in a record seven out of 10 categories for an award in the 2009 Scottish School Magazine Competition; notes that the school magazine, Bac Talk, has been nominated in the categories of best magazine cover, best overall design and layout, best original artwork or photograph, best commercial strategy, most inspirational teacher, outstanding individual and Scottish school magazine of the year 2009, and wishes Boclair Academy and the other schools taking part the best of luck. Supported by: Margaret Mitchell, Des McNulty, Hugh O’Donnell, Mary Mulligan, Karen Whitefield, Bill Kidd, Gil Paterson, Jamie McGrigor, John Park, Stuart McMillan, Mr Frank McAveety, Jackie Baillie, Ken Macintosh, Hugh Henry, Sandra White
S3M-4225 2009 Scottish School Magazine Competition, Boclair Academy, East Dunbartonshire (lodged on 26 May 2009) Sarah Boyack*
S3M-4225 2009 Scottish School Magazine Competition, Boclair Academy, East Dunbartonshire (lodged on 26 May 2009) Marilyn Livingstone*
